Case Study: Green Roof Rigid Post and Cable System

Close

Task:

 Our customer needed a solution to help protect their workers while accessing the green roof to water and maintain the vegetation.

Solution:

 Upon receiving the documents/drawings for the job, Unistrut examined the layout requested by the Arch/Eng. After careful review, Unistrut determined that there was a better, more cost efficient way to keep the workers safe while accessing these areas. By value engineering the original design, Unistrut saved our customer money while giving their employee a better, safer work environment.
